titleStmt.title: Unto His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament. The petition of Alexander Hamiltoun of Kinkel.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, Alexander, of Kinkel, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Concerns the dispute between Alexander Hamilton and John Aytoun of Kinaldy.
Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
